description:
This course is designed to take you from zero to advanced on Twitter in a very methodical and time effective way.  Users of any level will benefit from the materials.  I believe in working toward the end in mind and realize that certain concepts require experience to really sink in. 

The course is very modular and is built around Ten 5-8 minute videos.  You can whip through all of the segments, however, I suspect that you will be coming back to a few of them over and over as you come further up the learning curve. 

Some of the modules will be broken out into their own courses for those who want even greater hands-on experience and depth; for example in how to use advanced power tools to enhance their Twitter campaigns.

Take this course if you want a well rounded Professional looking, Business or Corporate Twitter account / and subsequent marketing campaign.  This course sets you up for success and is a pre-requisite for more advanced courses in the series.
title: Twitter Marketing Best Practices & Analytics for Business
